item.title: Rebekah add a quote by Patricia Briggs
item.description: "Women are the bloodthirsty sex," said Ric sadly. "We get the reputation, but it is only because the women stand behind us, and say, 'Kill it. Squish it." -- Patricia Briggs

item.title: Rebekah add a quote by Kim Harrison
item.description: "I told you, computers are like women. If you shout at them or ask them to do too many things at once, they shut down and you won't even get a sniff" pg. 4" -- Kim Harrison

item.title: Rebekah add a quote by Kim Harrison
item.description: "That's why I want you there, he said. You're unpredictable, and that can be the difference between success and failure. Most people make decisions in anger, fear, love, or obligation. You make decisions to irritate people." -- Kim Harrison

item.title: Rebekah add a quote by Alexandra Ivy
item.description: "I hate to interrupt such a touching scene but those hellhounds are not going to wait for you two to play kissey face. So, unless you intend to nail a chunk of roast beef to my butt and have me run around as a distraction, I would suggest we prepare for battle." Pg. 113-114" -- Alexandra Ivy

item.title: Rebekah add a quote by Heidi Betts
item.description: ". . . she jumped to her feet and hurried off, returning only seconds later with a dark brown bottle and a coffee mug that said And then Buffy staked Edward. The End." -- Heidi Betts
